en: About Workers and Families First
zh: 關於工人和家庭優先計劃

en: The City is providing $10 million to reimburse businesses with employees located in San Francisco to provide an extra 5 days of paid sick time for those employees.
zh: 市政府將撥款$1千萬元以補貼為在三藩市工作的員工提供額外五天帶薪病假的企業。

en: We are pre-approving businesses to make sure we have the funding to reimburse you when you file your claim.
zh: 我們正在預先審批各企業，以確保你在提出索賠時我們有足夠的資金向你提供補貼。

en: You will need the following information about your business:
zh: 我們會詢問以下業務的相關資料：

en: Type (sole proprietorship, corporation, LLC, partnership, nonprofit)
zh: 類型（個人，公司，LLC，合夥企業，非營利組織）

en: Industry type
zh: 行業類別

en: Address in San Francisco
zh: 三藩市地址

en: Business Account Number (you can look it up)
zh: 企業帳號（你可在此找尋）

en: Location ID Number (LIN) for one of your SF locations (you can look it up)
zh: 位置帳號，屬你其中一個的三藩市工作地點（你可在此找尋）

en: Federal Tax ID, also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN).
zh: 聯邦稅號，亦稱為僱主識別碼（EIN）。

en: Lost or misplaced your EIN?
zh: 遺失或不見了你的EIN？

en: Estimate of your number of staff in all locations (full and part-time)
zh: 所有地點的員工估計總人數（全職和兼職）

en: Number of staff who work in SF (full and part-time), that you will ask to be reimbursed for
zh: 為在三藩市工作的員工申請補貼的總人數 （全職和兼職）

en: Estimated of weekly hours your SF staff (full and part-time) usually work
zh: 員工在三藩市通常每週工作的估計時間（全職和兼職）

en: Get started
zh: 開始

en: Eligibility
zh: 符合資格準則

en: To reserve funding from the Workers and Families First program, you must:
zh: 要從「工人和家庭優先計劃」中申請預留補貼金，你必須：

en: Pay your San Francisco employees whom you want reimbursement for, up to an extra 5 days of paid sick leave beyond your existing policy.
zh: 在你現有的政策之外，最多可向想獲得補貼的三藩市員工多支付額外五天的帶薪病假。

en: Make sure that all employees you want reimbursed will be paid at least $15.59 per hour.
zh: 確保你所有想要補貼的員工每小時至少獲得$ 15.59的報酬。

en: Pay the difference between minimum wage and your employee’s regular rate for their sick leave, for any employees under this agreement.
zh: 對於本協議下，請支付所有員工最低工資與員工病假的正常工資之間的差額。

en: Make sure your business is current on business registration, regulatory licenses, and business tax obligations. You can defer some taxes during the coronavirus outbreak.
zh: 確保你的公司符合最新的商業註冊，監管許可和營業稅義務。 你可以在冠狀病毒爆發期間延遲一些稅收款項。

en: Comply with San Francisco labor laws regarding employee health care, paid sick leave, and minimum wages ​as well as all federal, state, and local labor laws.
zh: 遵守有關員工醫療保健，帶薪病假和最低工資的三藩市勞動法，以及所有聯邦，州和地方勞動法。

en: I acknowledge all listed eligibility conditions
zh: 我確認所有列出的資格條件

en: Your contact information
zh: 你的聯繫方式

en: First name
zh: 名字

en: Last name
zh: 姓氏

en: Phone number
zh: 電話號碼

en: Email address
zh: 電子郵件帳號

en: Mailing address
zh: 郵寄地址

en: Your business
zh: 你的企業

en: Your business must have a location in San Francisco
zh: 你的企業必須在三藩市設有地點

en: Business name
zh: 企業名稱

en: Business address for one of your San Francisco locations
zh: 你企業地點之一的三藩市地址

en: Business Account Number (BAN)
zh: 企業帳號（BAN）

en: Your BAN is a 7-digit number. If you don’t know it, you can look it up.
zh: 你的企業帳號（BAN）是7位數字。 如果你不知道，可以在此查看。

en: Location ID number (LIN) for one of your San Francisco locations
zh: 你企業的三藩市地點之一的位置ID號（LIN）

en: If you don't know your LIN, you can look it up.
zh: 如果你不知道位置ID號（LIN），可以在此查看。

en: Federal Tax ID
zh: 聯邦稅號

en: Also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN).
zh: 也稱為僱主識別碼（EIN）。

en: Lost or misplaced your EIN?
zh: 遺失或不見了你的僱主識別碼（EIN）？

en: Your business type
zh: 你的企業類別

en: Type of business
zh: 企業類別

en: Sole Proprietorship
zh: 獨資

en: Corporation
zh: 公司

en: LLC
zh: 有限責任公司

en: Partnership
zh: 合夥

en: Nonprofit
zh: 非營利組織

en: Other
zh: 其他

en: Your employees
zh: 你的員工

en: We can reimburse you up to $311,176 (equivalent to covering 499 full-time employees)
zh: 我們最多可向你補貼311,176美元（相當於可以補貼到499名全職員工）

en: Number of employees in all your locations (full and part-time)
zh: 你所有地點的員工人數（全職和兼職）

en: 1 to 49
500 and over
zh: 500 及以上

en: I confirm I have exhausted the 80 hours of extra paid sick leave beyond my existing policy, required by the federal government in response to the coronavirus outbreak.
zh: 我確認我已經用完了聯邦政府為應對冠狀病毒爆發而要求的現行政策之外的額外80小時帶薪病假。

en: See the Families First Coronavirus Response Act on Congress.gov
zh: 了解Congress.gov上的《家庭首次冠狀病毒應對法》

en: Your part-time employees
zh: 你的兼職員工

en: Number of part-time San Francisco employees you will ask for reimbursement for
zh: 你申請補貼的三藩市兼職員工數量

en: We’ll reimburse you for this number. If you report more staff when you claim your reimbursement, we may be able to if we have enough funding.
zh: 我們將向你補貼該數目。 若果你在申請時提出補貼更多員工，我們或許可以提供更多的補貼如果我們還有足夠的資金的話。

en: Estimated average number of hours you expect each of your part-time San Francisco employees will take for sick leave
zh: 你估計每位兼職三藩市員工平均將申請多少小時的病假

en: We’ll reimburse you up to 40 hours of minimum wage over 5 days, for the number of staff you report in this form.
zh: 根據你在此表格中報告的員工人數，我們將在5天內向您補貼最高40小時的最低工資。

en: Your full-time employees
zh: 你的全職員工

en: Number of full-time San Francisco employees you will ask for reimbursement for
zh: 你申請補貼的三藩市全職員工數量

en: Estimated average number of hours you expect each of your full-time San Francisco employees will take for sick leave
zh: 你估計每位全職舊金山員工平均將請多少小時的病假

en: Submit
zh: 完成
